result.html: Bhí a cheann cromthaHis head was bowed.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a ċeann cromṫaHis head was bowed.

result.html: Chroith an captaen a cheannThe captain shook his head.
result.ponchtml: Ċroiṫ an captaen a ċeannThe captain shook his head.

result.html: D'ardaigh an t-éan a cheannThe bird raised his head.
result.ponchtml: D'ardaiġ an t-éan a ċeannThe bird raised his head.

result.eng: I managed to reach my destination.
result.ga: D'éirigh liom mo cheann scríbe a bhaint amach
result.orig: D'éirigh liom mo cheann scríbe a bhaint amach
result.html: D'éirigh liom mo cheann scríbe a bhaint amachI managed to reach my destination.
result.ponchtml: D'éiriġ liom mo ċeann scríbe a ḃaint amaċI managed to reach my destination.

result.eng: The plan could be finished in six years.
result.ga: D'fhéadfadh an beart a bheith críochnaithe faoi cheann sé bliana
result.orig: D'fhéadfadh an beart a bheith críochnaithe faoi cheann sé bliana
result.html: D'fhéadfadh an beart a bheith críochnaithe faoi cheann sé blianaThe plan could be finished in six years.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟéadfaḋ an beart a ḃeiṫ críoċnaiṫe faoi ċeann sé blianaThe plan could be finished in six years.

result.eng: Many a person in this country doesn't read a book the whole year.
result.ga: Is iomaí duine sa tír seo nach léann leabhar ar bith ó cheann ceann na bliana
result.orig: Is iomaí duine sa tír seo nach léann leabhar ar bith ó cheann ceann na bliana
result.html: Is iomaí duine sa tír seo nach léann leabhar ar bith ó cheann ceann na blianaMany a person in this country doesn't read a book the whole year.
result.ponchtml: Is iomaí duine sa tír seo naċ léann leaḃar ar biṫ ó ċeann ceann na blianaMany a person in this country doesn't read a book the whole year.

result.eng: He doesn't have much hair on his head.
result.ga: Níl mórán gruaige ar a cheann
result.orig: Níl mórán gruaige ar a cheann
result.html: Níl mórán gruaige ar a cheannHe doesn't have much hair on his head.
result.ponchtml: Níl mórán gruaige ar a ċeannHe doesn't have much hair on his head.

result.eng: Tell me about the pastimes you have from one end of the week to the other.
result.ga: Inis dom faoin gcaitheamh aimsire a bhíonn agat ó cheann ceann na seachtaine
result.orig: Inis dom faoin gcaitheamh aimsire a bhíonn agat ó cheann ceann na seachtaine
result.html: Inis dom faoin gcaitheamh aimsire a bhíonn agat ó cheann ceann na seachtaineTell me about the pastimes you have from one end of the week to the other.
result.ponchtml: Inis dom faoin gcaiṫeaṁ aimsire a ḃíonn agat ó ċeann ceann na seaċtaineTell me about the pastimes you have from one end of the week to the other.

result.eng: Two of them are very big but the other one is very small.
result.ga: Tá dhá cheann acu an-mhór ach tá an ceann eile an-bheag
result.orig: Tá dhá cheann acu an-mhór ach tá an ceann eile an-bheag
result.html: Tá dhá cheann acu an-mhór ach tá an ceann eile an-bheagTwo of them are very big but the other one is very small.
result.ponchtml: Tá ḋá ċeann acu an-ṁór aċ tá an ceann eile an-ḃeagTwo of them are very big but the other one is very small.

result.eng: They were trying not to hurt the animal in the head.
result.ga: Bhí siad ag iarraidh gan an t-ainmhí a ghoin sa cheann
result.orig: Bhí siad ag iarraidh gan an t-ainmhí a ghoin sa cheann
result.html: Bhí siad ag iarraidh gan an t-ainmhí a ghoin sa cheannThey were trying not to hurt the animal in the head.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ag iarraiḋ gan an t-ainṁí a ġoin sa ċeannThey were trying not to hurt the animal in the head.

result.eng: They left the airplane and went inside the other one.
result.ga: D'fhág siad an t-eitleán agus chuaigh isteach sa cheann eile
result.orig: D'fhág siad an t-eitleán agus chuaigh isteach sa cheann eile
result.html: D'fhág siad an t-eitleán agus chuaigh isteach sa cheann eileThey left the airplane and went inside the other one.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág siad an t-eitleán agus ċuaiġ isteaċ sa ċeann eileThey left the airplane and went inside the other one.

result.eng: And if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.
result.ga: Agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobh
result.orig: Agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobh
result.html: Agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobhAnd if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.
result.ponchtml: Agus dá mba ḃuama é caiṫfiḋ gur ċeann ollṁór é a ṗléascfaḋ an foirgneaṁ amaċ ar ḋá ṫaoḃAnd if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.

result.eng: I told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
result.ga: Dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsa
result.orig: Dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsa
result.html: Dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsaI told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
result.ponchtml: Dúirt mé le mo ċoṁarsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aġaiḋ go dtí mo ċeann cúrsaI told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.

result.eng: His wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ga: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.orig: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.html: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ a ḃean marḃ aċ cupla mí go raḃaṫas á rá i moḋ rúin go raiḃ sé ag smaoineaṁ ar ċeann eile a ṫarraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.

result.eng: He wouldn't take his head out of the drink. He wouldn't stop drinking.
result.ga: Ní raibh a cheann le tógáil aige as ólachán
result.orig: Ní raibh a cheann le tógáil aige as ólachán
result.html: Ní raibh a cheann le tógáil aige as ólachánHe wouldn't take his head out of the drink. He wouldn't stop drinking.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ a ċeann le tógáil aige as ólaċánHe wouldn't take his head out of the drink. He wouldn't stop drinking.

result.eng: He was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
result.ga: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis
result.orig: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis
result.html: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leisHe was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé eadar ḋá ċóṁairle cé acu a ḃéarfaḋ sé leis an príosúnaċ nó a ligfeaḋ sé a ċeann leisHe was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.

result.eng: The night is coming, where will I rest my head?
result.ga: Tá an oíche ag teacht agus cá leagfaidh mé mo cheann
result.orig: Tá an oíche ag teacht agus cá leagfaidh mé mo cheann
result.html: Tá an oíche ag teacht agus cá leagfaidh mé mo cheannThe night is coming, where will I rest my head?
result.ponchtml: Tá an oíċe ag teaċt agus cá leagfaiḋ mé mo ċeannThe night is coming, where will I rest my head?

result.eng: Where will I rest my head tonight?
result.ga: Cá háit a leagfaidh mé mo cheann go maidin
result.orig: Cá háit a leagfaidh mé mo cheann go maidin
result.html: Cá háit a leagfaidh mé mo cheann go maidinWhere will I rest my head tonight?
result.ponchtml: Cá háit a leagfaiḋ mé mo ċeann go maidinWhere will I rest my head tonight?
